view-transitions.title: Embracing the future with the View Transitions API
view-transitions.description: Merchants need tools that are not just powerful, but also intuitive. That's why we're experimenting with new ways to enhance the Shopify admin experience using the View Transitions API.

content.title: Content
content.description: Thoughtful, consistent interface content is a core element of a well-designed user experience.

actionable-language.title: Actionable language
actionable-language.description: Merchants use Shopify to get things done. Content should be written and structured to help them understand and take the most important actions.

alternative-text.title: Alternative text
alternative-text.description: Alternative text (alt text) helps provide an inclusive experience for merchants who use screen readers.

error-messages.title: Error messages
error-messages.description: Error messages can be scary. Make errors visible to merchants, easy to understand, and helpful.

grammar-and-mechanics.title: Grammar and mechanics
grammar-and-mechanics.description: This guide is to help designers, developers, recruiters, UX-ers, product managers, support advisors, or anyone who writes public-facing text for Shopify.

help-content.title: Help content
help-content.description: Help content is educational text that describes interactive elements or offers information about concepts in the UI.

help-documentation.title: Help documentation
help-documentation.description: After you build an app or other integration, writing help documentation will show merchants how to use it.

inclusive-language.title: Inclusive language
inclusive-language.description: Make commerce better for everyone by writing inclusively.

merchant-to-customer.title: Merchant-to-customer content
merchant-to-customer.description: Shopify creates content for different audiences. One of those audiences is merchants’ customers. A customer is a person or organization who interacts with a Shopify merchant or a merchant’s sales channel.

naming.title: Naming
naming.description: The names we give our products and features teach merchants how to use Shopify and how to find the things they need to run their business.

product-content.title: Product content
product-content.description: Thoughtful, consistent interface content is a core element of a well-designed user experience.

voice-and-tone.title: Voice and tone
voice-and-tone.description: Learn how to apply Shopify’s voice and choose the right tone, no matter what product, feature, or app you’re building.

contributing.title: Contributing
contributing.description: Polaris is built for merchants, by you.

components.title: Components
components.description: Anyone is welcome to contribute to Polaris React components. There are several types of component contributions, but they typically fall under three categories; bug fix, enhancement, or new pattern.

design.title: Design
design.description: Design principles serve as guiding notions that shape the design of the Shopify admin, with Polaris providing support in implementing these principles effectively.

colors.title: Color
colors.description: Color highlights important areas, communicates status, urgency, and directs attention.

palettes-and-roles.title: Palettes and roles
palettes-and-roles.description: Color highlights important areas, communicates status, urgency, and directs attention.

using-color.title: Using color
using-color.description: Color highlights important areas, communicates status, urgency, and directs attention.

data-visualizations.title: Data visualizations
data-visualizations.description: Visualizations surface patterns in data, and provide immediate answers to a single, specific question.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Depth introduces a sense of realism, helps establish visual hierarchy, and creates focus.

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: Icons enhance an experience by providing intuitive and efficient navigation, conveying information concisely, and making it more visually appealing.

creating-icons.title: Creating Icons
creating-icons.description: Icons enhance an experience by providing intuitive and efficient navigation, conveying information concisely, and making it more visually appealing.

using-icons.title: Using Icons
using-icons.description: Icons enhance an experience by providing intuitive and efficient navigation, conveying information concisely, and making it more visually appealing.

illustrations.title: Illustrations
illustrations.description: The Shopify admin uses a precise illustration style to help merchants quickly and clearly understand how things work across every experience.

interaction-states.title: Interaction states
interaction-states.description: Interaction states communicate the status of an element in the interface, establish confidence once an action is taken, and suggest the ability (or inability) to interact with the element.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Layout determines the placement, positioning, and organization of various components within the UI, such as buttons, menus, content sections, and other visual elements.

density.title: Density
density.description: The admin is high density by default, but the level of density can range depending on the merchant's task.

layout-tokens.title: Tokens
layout-tokens.description: Apply consistent and harmonious space within and between ui elements.

spacial-organization.title: Spacial organization
spacial-organization.description: Components, elements and surfaces are organized to create compositions that make the best use of space.

motion.title: Motion
motion.description: Motion brings dynamism to an interface, offers visual feedback, and aids merchants understanding the outcomes of their actions.

creating-motion.title: Creating Motion
creating-motion.description: Motion brings dynamism to an interface, offers visual feedback and aids merchants understanding the outcomes of their actions.

using-motion.title: Using Motion
using-motion.description: Motion brings dynamism to an interface, offers visual feedback and aids merchants understanding the outcomes of their actions.

pro-design-language.title: Pro design language
pro-design-language.description: Efficiency, intuition, and style combined to empower merchants with data-rich views, action-driven interfaces, and dynamic interactions.

sounds.title: Sounds
sounds.description: We use sound to communicate information and to enhance how merchants experience the Shopify admin. Sound patterns make interactions easier and more predictable.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Typography is the art of arranging type in ways that provides innate hierarchy to UI.

font-and-typescale.title: Font and Typescale
font-and-typescale.description: Typography is the art of arranging type in ways that provides innate hierarchy to UI.

typography-tokens.title: Tokens
typography-tokens.description: Typography is the art of arranging type in ways that provides innate hierarchy to UI.

using-type.title: Using type
using-type.description: Typography is the art of arranging type in ways that provides innate hierarchy to UI.

foundations.title: Foundations
foundations.description: Polaris is the design system for the Shopify admin. It’s the shared language that guides how we build high-quality merchant experiences.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making commerce better for everyone means caring deeply about making quality products. A quality product should have a fantastic user experience (UX).

experience-values.title: Shopify experience values
experience-values.description: At Shopify, we empower commerce at a global scale. We build products, tools, and services for people to start, manage, and scale their businesses. We manage enormous complexity for commerce giants, and give new entrepreneurs the best chance to succeed.

formatting-localized-currency.title: Formatting localized currency
formatting-localized-currency.description: Currencies are formatted differently in different countries and languages.

information-architecture.title: Information architecture
information-architecture.description: Everything we create at Shopify has an underlying foundation of information architecture. If you’re a designer, a content strategist, or a UX developer, you’re already doing IA work.

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.description: Make commerce better for everyone by building interfaces that work everywhere. These guidelines will help you design, write, and build products that can be used in every part of the world.

getting-started.title: Getting started
getting-started.description: Polaris is the design system for the Shopify admin. If you’re just starting out with Polaris, here’s a list of recommended resources and guidance to get you started.

components-lifecycle.title: Component lifecycle
components-lifecycle.description: Polaris components move through a series of stages throughout their lifecycle. Within each stage, a component must meet a set of requirements.

polaris-101.title: Polaris 101
polaris-101.description: The Polaris design system is used by designers and developers to build world-class Shopify admin experiences.

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: Use icons to increase visual appeal and improve navigation, comprehension, and engagement.

patterns.title: Patterns
patterns.description: Preferred solutions to common merchant goals in the admin.

app-settings-layout.title: App settings layout
app-settings-layout.description: Scan and find groups of settings in apps

date-picking.title: Date picking
date-picking.description: Select a date or a date range

resource-details-layout.title: Resource details layout
resource-details-layout.description: Create, view, and edit resource objects

resource-index-layout.title: Resource index layout
resource-index-layout.description: Organize and take action on resource objects

loading.title: Loading
loading.description: Navigating the Shopify admin should be fast, meaningful, and focused. Intentional loading states deliver a continuous flow for merchants.

new-badge.title: New badge
new-badge.description: The New badge can be used to inform merchants about the release of a feature that creates new value. It should be used sparingly and for a short time frame.

pickers.title: Pickers
pickers.description: Picker experiences help merchants browse, find, and select from multiple options. Use them for selecting locations, customer segments, and more.

text-fields.title: Text fields
text-fields.description: Text fields combine the field label (the title) and the input area. Inputs can vary from typed text to URLs to date pickers.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: Tokens are variables that represent design decisions such as color, typography, and spacing, in a consistent and reusable way.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Extensions, plugins, and other tools to help build with Polaris.

polaris-for-vscode.title: VS Code
polaris-for-vscode.description: Official VS Code extension for building with the Shopify Polaris design system.

polaris-migrator.title: Migrator
polaris-migrator.description: Codemod transformations to help upgrade your Polaris codebase.

stylelint-polaris.title: Stylelint
stylelint-polaris.description: A configuration of Stylelint rules that promote adoption of the Polaris design system in consuming apps.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: There are over 40 rules configured in Stylelint Polaris to help you avoid errors and follow stylistic and non-stylistic conventions while building for the Shopify admin. These rules are grouped into categories that help us measure the Polaris design system's coverage in the Shopify admin code base.

border-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: border/at-rule-disallowed-list
border-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass border mixins.

border-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: border/custom-property-disallowed-list
border-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy border custom properties.

border-declaration-property-unit-disallo.title: border/declaration-property-unit-disallowed-list
border-declaration-property-unit-disallo.description: Disallows hard-coded `px`, `em`, and `rem` units in border property values.

border-function-disallowed-list.title: border/function-disallowed-list
border-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass border functions.

color-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: color/at-rule-disallowed-list
color-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy color mixins.

color-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: color/custom-property-disallowed-list
color-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy color custom properties.

color-function-disallowed-list.title: color/function-disallowed-list
color-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows allows use of built in and legacy color functions.

color-global-disallowed-list.title: color/global-disallowed-list
color-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy color Sass APIs.

conventions-custom-property-allowed-list.title: conventions/custom-property-allowed-list
conventions-custom-property-allowed-list.description: Allows definition of custom properties not using Polaris prefixes, flags declaration property values that are not valid Polaris tokens, flags declaration property values using private tokens.

conventions-selector-disallowed-list.title: conventions/selector-disallowed-list
conventions-selector-disallowed-list.description: Disallows overrides of Polaris component styles.

layout-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: layout/at-rule-disallowed-list
layout-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass mixins.

layout-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: layout/custom-property-disallowed-list
layout-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy layout custom properties.

layout-declaration-property-value-disall.title: layout/declaration-property-value-disallowed-list
layout-declaration-property-value-disall.description: Disallows declaration of positioning and dimension property values with Polaris tokens.

layout-function-disallowed-list.title: layout/function-disallowed-list
layout-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of internal Sass layout functions.

layout-global-disallowed-list.title: layout/global-disallowed-list
layout-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy layout Sass APIs.

legacy-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: legacy/at-rule-disallowed-list
legacy-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass mixins.

legacy-function-disallowed-list.title: legacy/function-disallowed-list
legacy-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use off legacy Sass functions.

legacy-global-disallowed-list.title: legacy/global-disallowed-list
legacy-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy custom properties and Sass mixin map data.

media-queries-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: media-queries/at-rule-disallowed-list
media-queries-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy breakpoint Sass mixins.

media-queries-function-disallowed-list.title: media-queries/function-disallowed-list
media-queries-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy breakpoint sass functions.

media-queries-media-queries-allowed-list.title: media-queries/media-queries-allowed-list
media-queries-media-queries-allowed-list.description: Allows declaration of `print` and `screen` `@media` queries, allows `@media` queries for `forced-colors` and `ms-high-contrast` features, allows `@media` queries using Polaris breakpoints.

motion-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: motion/custom-property-disallowed-list
motion-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy motion custom properties.

motion-declaration-property-unit-disallo.title: motion/declaration-property-unit-disallowed-list
motion-declaration-property-unit-disallo.description: Disallows use of hard-coded millisecond `ms` and second `s` values on transition and animation properties.

motion-function-disallowed-list.title: motion/function-disallowed-list
motion-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass motion functions.

motion-global-disallowed-list.title: motion/global-disallowed-list
motion-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy motion Sass APIs.

shadow-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: shadow/custom-property-disallowed-list
shadow-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy shadow custom properties.

shadow-declaration-property-unit-disallo.title: shadow/declaration-property-unit-disallowed-list
shadow-declaration-property-unit-disallo.description: Disallows box-shadow declarations with hard coded px, rem, or em units.

shadow-function-disallowed-list.title: shadow/function-disallowed-list
shadow-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of built-in and legacy shadow functions.

shadow-global-disallowed-list.title: shadow/global-disallowed-list
shadow-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy shadow Sass APIs.

space-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: space/custom-property-disallowed-list
space-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy space custom properties.

space-declaration-property-unit-disallow.title: space/declaration-property-unit-disallowed-list
space-declaration-property-unit-disallow.description: Disallows use of hard-coded px, em, and rem values on gap, margin, and padding properties.

space-function-disallowed-list.title: space/function-disallowed-list
space-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass space functions.

space-global-disallowed-list.title: space/global-disallowed-list
space-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy spacing Sass APIs.

typography-at-rule-disallowed-list.title: typography/at-rule-disallowed-list
typography-at-rule-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass typography mixins.

typography-declaration-property-unit-dis.title: typography/declaration-property-unit-disallowed-list
typography-declaration-property-unit-dis.description: Disallows hard-coded `px`, `em`, and `rem` values for font-size and line-height properties.

typography-function-disallowed-list.title: typography/function-disallowed-list
typography-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy Sass typography functions.

typography-global-disallowed-list.title: typography/global-disallowed-list
typography-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy typography Sass APIs.

z-index-custom-property-disallowed-list.title: z-index/custom-property-disallowed-list
z-index-custom-property-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy z-index custom properties.

z-index-declaration-property-value-allow.title: z-index/declaration-property-value-allowed-list
z-index-declaration-property-value-allow.description: Disallows declaration of `z-index` values that are not Polaris z-index tokens.

z-index-function-disallowed-list.title: z-index/function-disallowed-list
z-index-function-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of the legacy z-index Sass function.

z-index-global-disallowed-list.title: z-index/global-disallowed-list
z-index-global-disallowed-list.description: Disallows use of legacy z-index Sass APIs.

version-guides.title: Version guides
version-guides.description: Guides for upgrading apps to major versions.

migrating-from-v11-to-v12.title: v12
migrating-from-v11-to-v12.description: Polaris v12.0.0 prop replacement, removal of components, renamed components, and token changes.

whats-new.title: What’s new
whats-new.description: Learn about the latest Polaris updates

uplifting-shopify-polaris.title: Uplifting Shopify Polaris
uplifting-shopify-polaris.description: The process of evolving a large scale design system.

version-10-typography.title: Version 10 Typography
version-10-typography.description: Learn about what changes are coming to Polaris typography.

version-11-color.title: Version 11 Color
version-11-color.description: Learn about what changes were introduced to color in Polaris v11.

version-11-layout.title: Version 11 Layout
version-11-layout.description: Start using the new Polaris layout components.

version-11-tokens.title: Version 11 Tokens
version-11-tokens.description: Crafting a more robust and cohesive token system in Polaris.

version-12.title: Version 12
version-12.description: This version introduces Shopify's new admin design language, refined tokens, aligned component APIs, and an updated Figma UI kit.
